attributes.additional_details: Efforts are being made by remainers to hold a referendum that will give voters a choice that will leave us with no option to fully leave the EU. This is not what the majority of people voted for. If a second referendum is held, then the option of leaving with no deal with the EU must be a choice.
attributes.background: if a second referendum on EU exit deal is held, then the options offered should be limited to, “Do you accept the deal negotiated by the government with the EU?”. Or, “ Do you believe that the deal negotiated by the government with the EU should be rejected, and the UK should leave with no deal?”
